metadata.titleEn: ChinaHighPM2.5: High-resolution and High-quality Ground-level PM2.5 Dataset for China (2000-2023)
metadata.titleCn: 中国高分辨率高质量PM2.5数据集（2000-2023）
metadata.description:
ChinaHighPM2.5 is one of the series of long-term, full-coverage, high-resolution, and high-quality datasets of ground-level air pollutants for China (i.e., ChinaHighAirPollutants, CHAP). It is generated from the big data (e.g., ground-based measurements, satellite remote sensing products, atmospheric reanalysis, and model simulations) using artificial intelligence by considering the spatiotemporal heterogeneity of air pollution. This is the big data-derived seamless (spatial coverage = 100%) daily, monthly, and yearly 1 km (i.e., D1K, M1K, and Y1K) ground-level PM2.5 dataset in China from 2000 to present. This dataset yields a high quality with a cross-validation coefficient of determination (CV-R2) of 0.92 and a root-mean-square error (RMSE) of 10.76 µg m-3 on a daily basis. Note that this dataset is continuously updated, and if you want to apply for more data or have any questions, please contact me (Email: weijing_rs@163.com; weijing@umd.edu).
The data file contains four codes (Python, Matlab, IDL and R language) nc2geotiff codes for NC to GeoTiff.
metadata.descriptionCn:
ChinaHighPM2.5数据集是中国高分辨率高质量近地表空气污染物数据集（ChinaHighAirPollutants, CHAP）中PM2.5数据集。该数据集利用人工智能技术，使用模式资料填补了卫星MODIS MAIAC AOD产品的空间缺失值，结合地基观测、大气再分析和排放清单等大数据生产得到2000年至今全国无缝隙地面PM2.5数据。数据十折交叉验证决定系数R2为0.92，均方根误差RMSE为10.76 µg/m3。主要范围为整个中国地区，空间分辨率为1 km，时间分辨率为日、月、年，单位为µg/m3。注意：该数据集持续更新，如需要更多数据，请发邮件联系作者（weijing_rs@163.com; weijing@umd.edu）。
数据文件中包含NC转GeoTiff的四种代码（Python、Matlab、IDL和R语言）nc2geotiff codes。
metadata.instructions: File Name: The data is stored in the NetCDF file format, and the file name is CHAP_PM2.5_ab_yyyymmdd_V1.nc, where a represents time resolution (D represents daily data, M represents monthly data, Y represents annual data), b represents spatial resolution (1K represents 1km), yyyy represents year, mm represents month, and dd represents day. Data reading method: Python, Matlab, IDL, and other programming methods can be used to convert files from NC to TIF. The data coordinate system is WGS-1984, with a background value of 65535.
metadata.instructionsCn: 文件命名：该数据以NetCDF文件格式存储，文件的名称为CHAP_PM2.5_ab_yyyymmdd_V1.nc，其中a表示时间分辨率（D表示日数据，M表示月数据，Y表示年数据），b表示空间分辨率（1K表示1km），yyyy代表年，mm表示月，dd表示日。数据读取方式：可用Python、Matlab、IDL等编程实现文件从nc到tif的转换。数据坐标系为WGS-1984，背景值为65535。

literatureList.titleEn: Reconstructing 1-km-resolution high-quality PM2.5 data records from 2000 to 2018 in China: spatiotemporal variations and policy implications
literatureList.referenceEn: Wei, J., Li, Z., Lyapustin, A., Sun, L., Peng, Y., Xue, W., Su, T., & Cribb, M. (2021). Reconstructing 1-km-resolution high-quality PM2.5 data records from 2000 to 2018 in China: spatiotemporal variations and policy implications. Remote Sensing of Environment, 252, 112136. https://doi.org/10.1016/j.rse.2020.112136

literatureList.titleEn: Improved 1 km resolution PM2.5 estimates across China using enhanced space-time extremely randomized trees
literatureList.referenceEn: Wei, J., Li, Z., Cribb, M., Huang, W., Xue, W., Sun, L., Guo, J., Peng, Y., Li, J., Lyapustin, A., Liu, L., Wu, H., & Song, Y. (2020). Improved 1 km resolution PM2.5 estimates across China using enhanced space-time extremely randomized trees. Atmospheric Chemistry and Physics, 20(6), 3273-3289. https://doi.org/10.5194/acp-20-3273-2020

background: Exposure to fine particulate matter (PM2.5) can significantly harm human health and increase the risk of death. Satellite remote sensing allows for generating spatially continuous PM2.5 data, but current datasets have overall low accuracies with coarse spatial resolutions limited by data sources and models. Air pollution levels in China have experienced dramatic changes over the past couple of decades. In 2016, more than 92% of the world’s population lived in areas experiencing pollution levels exceeding national acceptable limits. Air pollution has become one of the major environmental risks affecting human health and can raise the risk of death, respiratory diseases, and cardiovascular diseases. About three million deaths per year are related to exposure to outdoor air pollution. In particular, fine particulate matter (i.e., PM2.5) has become the fifth leading lethal risk around the world. Long-term exposure to PM2.5 has resulted in 4.2 million deaths, accounting for 7.6% of deaths in 2015 globally and 59% of deaths in eastern and southern Asia, especially China. Since the start of the twentieth century, the Chinese government has implemented a large number of policies to both promote the national economy and improve air quality. Over the years, remote sensing technology has been widely applied in estimating spatially continuous near-surface PM2.5 concentrations. Aerosol optical depth (AOD) products generated from multi-source satellites, e.g., the Moderate-resolution Imaging Spectroradiometer (MODIS), the Visible infrared Imaging Radiometer (VIIRS), and Himawari-8, have been employed as the most critical independent variable to derive PM2.5 concentrations due to their strongly positive relationships.
research objective: To reveal the spatiotemporal variations of PM2.5, long-term and high-spatial-resolution aerosol optical depths, generated by the Moderate Resolution Imaging Spectroradiometer (MODIS) Multi-Angle implementation of Atmospheric Correction (MAIAC) algorithm, were employed to estimate PM2.5 concentrations at a 1 km resolution using our proposed Space-Time Extra-Trees (STET) model.
challenges: Traditional physical methods have been used to derive daily PM2.5 concentrations by calculating the fine-mode fraction and correcting for humidity and altitude, but these PM2.5 estimates were poorly correlated with surface measurements.
methods: For this purpose, our proposed tree-based ensemble Space-Time Extra-Trees (STET) model is adopted here to retrieve PM2.5 concentrations. The 1 km MODIS Multi-Angle implementation of Atmospheric Correction (MAIAC) aerosol product (MCD19A2), newly released in May 2018, is used in this study. Ancillary information on meteorological variables, land use, pollutant emissions, and population are involved in the model to improve PM2.5-AOD relationships. Based on this, we produce for the first time a high-resolution and high-quality PM2.5 dataset for China (i.e., China-HighPM2.5), reconstructing the period from 2000 to 2018. We also perform a comprehensive investigation of spatiotemporal PM2.5 variations across China.
dataset: The resulting PM2.5 dataset for China (i.e., ChinaHighPM2.5) provides the longest record (i.e., 2000 to 2018) at a high spatial resolution of 1 km, enabling the study of PM2.5 variation patterns at different scales.
findings: Our model can capture well variations in PM2.5 concentrations at different spatiotemporal scales, with higher accuracies (i.e., cross-validation coefficient of determination, CV-R2 = 0.86 – 0.90) and stronger predictive powers (i.e., R2 = 0.80 – 0.82) than previously reported. In most places, PM2.5 concentrations showed increasing trends around 2007 and remained high until 2013, after which they declined substantially, thanks to a series of government actions combating air pollution in China. While nationwide PM2.5 concentrations have decreased by 0.89 μg/m3/yr (p < 0.001) during the last two decades, the reduction has accelerated to 4.08 μg/m3/yr (p < 0.001) over the last six years, indicating a significant improvement in air quality. Large improvements occurred in the Pearl and Yangtze River Deltas, while the most polluted region remained the North China Plain, especially in winter.
backgroundCn: 细颗粒物（PM2.5）的暴露对人类健康造成显著危害，并增加死亡风险。卫星遥感技术可以生成空间连续的PM2.5数据，但当前的数据集整体准确性较低，空间分辨率粗糙，受限于数据源和模型。过去几十年，中国的空气污染水平经历了剧烈变化。2016年，全球超过92%的人口生活在污染水平超过国家可接受限值的地区。空气污染已成为影响人类健康的主要环境风险之一，并可能增加死亡风险、呼吸系统疾病和心血管疾病。每年约有三百万人的死亡与户外空气污染暴露有关。特别是细颗粒物（即PM2.5）已成为全球第五大致死风险。长期暴露于PM2.5导致了420万人的死亡，占2015年全球死亡人数的7.6%，在东亚和南亚的死亡人数中占59%，尤其是在中国。自20世纪初以来，中国政府实施了大量政策，以促进国家经济和改善空气质量。多年来，遥感技术已广泛应用于估算近地面PM2.5浓度的空间连续性。来自多源卫星（如中分辨率成像光谱仪（MODIS）、可见光红外成像辐射计（VIIRS）和Himawari-8）生成的气溶胶光学厚度（AOD）产品被用作推导PM2.5浓度的最关键自变量，因为它们之间存在强正相关关系。
research objectiveCn: 为了揭示PM2.5的时空变化，采用了由中分辨率成像光谱仪（MODIS）多角度大气校正（MAIAC）算法生成的长期高空间分辨率气溶胶光学深度，以利用我们提出的时空极端树（STET）模型在1公里分辨率下估算PM2.5浓度。
challengesCn: 传统的物理方法通过计算细颗粒分数并校正湿度和海拔高度来推导每日PM2.5浓度，但这些PM2.5估算值与地面测量值的相关性较差。
methodsCn: 为此，我们采用了基于树的集成模型空间-时间极端树（STET）来获取PM2.5浓度。本研究使用了2018年5月新发布的1公里MODIS多角度大气校正（MAIAC）气溶胶产品（MCD19A2）。模型中还涉及气象变量、土地利用、污染物排放和人口等辅助信息，以改善PM2.5与气溶胶光学厚度（AOD）之间的关系。在此基础上，我们首次为中国生产了高分辨率和高质量的PM2.5数据集（即China-HighPM2.5），重建了2000年至2018年的数据。同时，我们还对中国范围内PM2.5的时空变化进行了全面调查。
datasetCn: 中国的PM2.5数据集（即ChinaHighPM2.5）提供了2000年至2018年的最长记录，空间分辨率高达1公里，使得能够研究不同尺度下PM2.5变化模式。
findingsCn: 我们的模型能够很好地捕捉不同时空尺度下PM2.5浓度的变化，具有更高的准确性（即交叉验证决定系数CV-R2 = 0.86 – 0.90）和更强的预测能力（即R2 = 0.80 – 0.82），超过了之前的报告。在大多数地方，PM2.5浓度在2007年左右显示出上升趋势，并在2013年之前保持高位，此后由于一系列政府行动打击空气污染，浓度大幅下降。尽管全国PM2.5浓度在过去二十年中减少了0.89 μg/m3/年（p < 0.001），但在过去六年中，减少速度加快至4.08 μg/m3/年（p < 0.001），这表明空气质量有了显著改善。珠江三角洲和长江三角洲地区的改善尤为明显，而污染最严重的地区仍然是华北平原，尤其是在冬季。

Verification.QuestionEn: Is it possible to achieve a spatial resolution of 1 km for PM2.5 datasets using remote sensing technology?
Verification.QuestionCn: 使用遥感技术是否可以实现PM2.5数据集的1公里空间分辨率？

Verification.QuestionEn: Does the Space-Time Extra-Trees (STET) model enhance the accuracy of PM2.5 concentration predictions compared to traditional methods?
Verification.QuestionCn: 空间时间极端树（STET）模型是否提高了PM2.5浓度预测的准确性，相较于传统方法？

Disjunctive.QuestionEn: Are traditional physical methods, AI-based models, or hybrid approaches more effective in estimating PM2.5 concentrations from AOD data?
Disjunctive.QuestionCn: 传统物理方法、基于人工智能的模型还是混合方法在从气溶胶光学厚度（AOD）数据中估计PM2.5浓度方面更有效？

Disjunctive.QuestionEn: For enhancing PM2.5 datasets, is the incorporation of ancillary information like meteorological variables, land use, or pollutant emissions more crucial?
Disjunctive.QuestionCn: 为了增强PM2.5数据集，气象变量、土地利用或污染物排放等辅助信息的结合哪个更为关键？

Concept Completion.QuestionEn: What are the methods employed to estimate PM2.5 concentrations at high spatial resolutions?
Concept Completion.QuestionCn: 估计高空间分辨率PM2.5浓度的方法有哪些？

Concept Completion.QuestionEn: Where do satellite remote sensing data typically come from when generating spatially continuous PM2.5 datasets?
Concept Completion.QuestionCn: 卫星遥感数据通常来自哪里，以生成空间连续的PM2.5数据集？

Concept Completion.QuestionEn: What challenges are associated with traditional methods of deriving daily PM2.5 concentrations?
Concept Completion.QuestionCn: 传统的PM2.5浓度日常推导方法面临哪些挑战？
Concept Completion.AnswerCn: 与地表测量结果相关性较差

Example.QuestionEn: Can you provide an example of a data collection method used to fill spatial gaps in satellite-derived PM2.5 data?
Example.QuestionCn: 您能否提供一个用于填补卫星衍生PM2.5数据空间缺口的数据收集方法的例子？
Example.AnswerEn: A method that utilizes artificial intelligence to fill spatial gaps in satellite MODIS MAIAC AOD products was employed, using ancillary data such as ground observations, atmospheric reanalysis, and emission inventories to produce comprehensive PM2.5 data across China.
Example.AnswerCn: 一种利用人工智能填补卫星MODIS MAIAC AOD产品空间缺口的方法被采用，使用地面观测、气象再分析和排放清单等辅助数据，以生成中国范围内的全面PM2.5数据。

Example.QuestionEn: What is an example of a research approach to improve the accuracy of PM2.5 estimates from satellite data?
Example.QuestionCn: 一种提高卫星数据中PM2.5估计准确性的研究方法的例子是什么？
Example.AnswerEn: The Space-Time Extra-Trees (STET) model is an example of a research approach that enhances the accuracy of PM2.5 estimates by using high-resolution MODIS MAIAC aerosol optical depth data along with meteorological variables, land use, pollutant emissions, and population data.
Example.AnswerCn: 空间时间极端树（STET）模型是一种研究方法，通过使用高分辨率的MODIS MAIAC气溶胶光学深度数据以及气象变量、土地利用、污染物排放和人口数据，来提高PM2.5估计的准确性。

Example.QuestionEn: Could you give an example of a dataset that provides long-term PM2.5 records at high spatial resolution for a specific region?
Example.QuestionCn: 您能否提供一个提供特定区域长期PM2.5记录的高空间分辨率数据集的示例？
Example.AnswerEn: An example is the ChinaHighPM2.5 dataset, which offers a long-term record from 2000 to 2023 at a 1 km spatial resolution, enabling detailed studies of PM2.5 variation patterns across China.
Example.AnswerCn: ChinaHighPM2.5 数据集提供了从 2000 年到 2023 年的长期记录，空间分辨率为 1 公里，使得对中国 PM2.5 变化模式的详细研究成为可能。

Feature Specification.QuestionEn: What are the specific methods used to fill spatial missing values in satellite-derived data for PM2.5 concentration estimation?
Feature Specification.QuestionCn: 用于填补卫星衍生数据中PM2.5浓度估计的空间缺失值的具体方法有哪些？
Feature Specification.AnswerEn: artificial intelligence techniques, model data, satellite MODIS MAIAC AOD products, ground-based observations, atmospheric reanalysis, emission inventories
Feature Specification.AnswerCn: 人工智能技术、模型数据、卫星MODIS MAIAC AOD产品、地面观测、大气再分析、排放清单

Feature Specification.QuestionEn: What are the key factors that contribute to the high spatial resolution of 1 km in a PM2.5 dataset?
Feature Specification.QuestionCn: 导致PM2.5数据集高达1公里空间分辨率的关键因素有哪些？
Feature Specification.AnswerEn: long-term aerosol optical depths, high-spatial-resolution aerosol optical depths, MODIS Multi-Angle implementation of Atmospheric Correction (MAIAC) algorithm, meteorological variables, land use, pollutant emissions, population data
Feature Specification.AnswerCn: 长期气溶胶光学厚度，高空间分辨率气溶胶光学厚度，MODIS多角度大气校正（MAIAC）算法，气象变量，土地利用，污染物排放，人口数据

Feature Specification.QuestionEn: What properties are considered to validate the accuracy of PM2.5 concentration models in data collection processes?
Feature Specification.QuestionCn: 在数据收集过程中，验证PM2.5浓度模型准确性的属性包括哪些？

Quantification.QuestionEn: What is the spatial resolution of the data used to estimate PM2.5 concentrations in China?
Quantification.QuestionCn: 用于估计中国PM2.5浓度的数据的空间分辨率是多少？

Quantification.QuestionEn: What is the cross-validation coefficient of determination (CV-R2) range achieved by the model used for PM2.5 data estimation?
Quantification.QuestionCn: 用于PM2.5数据估计的模型所达到的交叉验证决定系数（CV-R2）范围是多少？

Definition.QuestionEn: What does 'artificial intelligence technology' mean in the context of data collection for PM2.5 datasets?
Definition.QuestionCn: 在PM2.5数据集的数据收集中，“人工智能技术”是什么意思？
Definition.AnswerEn: In the context of data collection for PM2.5 datasets, 'artificial intelligence technology' refers to the use of advanced computational techniques to fill spatial gaps in satellite-derived data, enhance the accuracy of PM2.5 estimates, and integrate various data sources such as ground observations, atmospheric reanalysis, and emission inventories.
Definition.AnswerCn: 在PM2.5数据集的数据收集背景下，“人工智能技术”指的是使用先进的计算技术来填补卫星衍生数据中的空间空白，提高PM2.5估计的准确性，并整合各种数据源，如地面观测、大气重分析和排放清单。

Definition.QuestionEn: What is the 'Space-Time Extra-Trees (STET) model' in the context of estimating PM2.5 concentrations?
Definition.QuestionCn: 在估算PM2.5浓度的背景下，什么是“时空额外树（STET）模型”？
Definition.AnswerEn: The 'Space-Time Extra-Trees (STET) model' is a tree-based ensemble approach used to estimate PM2.5 concentrations by leveraging the high-resolution aerosol optical depth data from satellites, along with ancillary information such as meteorological variables and land use, to improve the correlations between PM2.5 and AOD measurements.
Definition.AnswerCn: “时空极端树（STET）模型”是一种基于树的集成方法，用于通过利用卫星的高分辨率气溶胶光学深度数据以及气象变量和土地利用等辅助信息来估计PM2.5浓度，从而改善PM2.5与AOD测量之间的相关性。

Comparison.QuestionEn: How do the data collection methods for PM2.5 using the Space-Time Extra-Trees (STET) model compare to traditional physical methods in terms of correlation with surface measurements?
Comparison.QuestionCn: 使用空间时间极端树（STET）模型进行PM2.5数据收集的方法与传统物理方法在与地面测量的相关性方面有何比较？
Comparison.AnswerEn: The Space-Time Extra-Trees (STET) model employs artificial intelligence and satellite data to estimate PM2.5 concentrations, showing higher correlations with surface measurements compared to traditional physical methods, which have shown poor correlation due to humidity and altitude corrections.
Comparison.AnswerCn: 空间时间极端树（STET）模型利用人工智能和卫星数据来估计PM2.5浓度，与传统物理方法相比，显示出与地面测量的相关性更高，而传统方法由于湿度和高度修正而表现出较差的相关性。

Comparison.QuestionEn: In what ways does the spatial resolution of the ChinaHighPM2.5 dataset differ from other PM2.5 datasets generated through satellite remote sensing?
Comparison.QuestionCn: 中国高PM2.5数据集的空间分辨率与其他通过卫星遥感生成的PM2.5数据集有何不同？
Comparison.AnswerEn: The ChinaHighPM2.5 dataset provides a high spatial resolution of 1 km, which is finer than many other PM2.5 datasets that typically have coarser resolutions due to limitations in data sources and models.
Comparison.AnswerCn: ChinaHighPM2.5 数据集提供了 1 公里的高空间分辨率，这比许多其他 PM2.5 数据集的分辨率要细，因为后者通常由于数据源和模型的限制而具有较粗的分辨率。

Interpretation.QuestionEn: What can the integration of multi-source satellite data and ground-based observations reveal about the spatial and temporal resolution of air pollution datasets?
Interpretation.QuestionCn: 多源卫星数据和地面观测的整合可以揭示空气污染数据集的空间和时间分辨率吗？
Interpretation.AnswerEn: The integration of multi-source satellite data, such as MODIS MAIAC AOD products, with ground-based observations, meteorological data, and emission inventories can enhance the spatial and temporal resolution of air pollution datasets, allowing for the production of high-resolution (1 km) and temporally continuous PM2.5 data across large regions like China from 2000 to the present.
Interpretation.AnswerCn: 多源卫星数据的整合，例如MODIS MAIAC AOD产品，与地面观测、气象数据和排放清单的结合，可以提高空气污染数据集的空间和时间分辨率，从而在像中国这样的大区域内生成高分辨率（1公里）和时间连续的PM2.5数据，覆盖2000年至今的时间段。

Interpretation.QuestionEn: How might the use of artificial intelligence models improve the accuracy of PM2.5 data collection compared to traditional physical methods?
Interpretation.QuestionCn: 人工智能模型的使用如何提高PM2.5数据收集的准确性，相较于传统的物理方法？
Interpretation.AnswerEn: Artificial intelligence models, such as the Space-Time Extra-Trees (STET) model, can improve the accuracy of PM2.5 data collection by effectively capturing variations in PM2.5 concentrations at different spatiotemporal scales, offering cross-validation coefficients and predictive powers superior to those achieved by traditional physical methods.
Interpretation.AnswerCn: 人工智能模型，如时空极端树（STET）模型，可以通过有效捕捉不同时空尺度下PM2.5浓度的变化，提高PM2.5数据收集的准确性，提供的交叉验证系数和预测能力优于传统物理方法。

Interpretation.QuestionEn: What challenges do researchers face in developing and maintaining high-quality PM2.5 datasets over extensive time periods, and how can they be addressed?
Interpretation.QuestionCn: 研究人员在开发和维护长期高质量PM2.5数据集时面临哪些挑战，以及如何解决这些挑战？
Interpretation.AnswerEn: Researchers face challenges such as spatial data gaps in satellite observations and the need to reconcile these with ground measurements and other ancillary data. These challenges can be addressed by using artificial intelligence techniques to fill spatial gaps, combining diverse data sources, and continuously updating datasets to reflect changes in air pollution over time.
Interpretation.AnswerCn: 研究人员面临着卫星观测中的空间数据缺口以及需要将这些缺口与地面测量和其他辅助数据进行调和的挑战。这些挑战可以通过使用人工智能技术填补空间缺口、结合多种数据源以及持续更新数据集以反映空气污染随时间变化来解决。

Causal Antecedent.QuestionEn: What factors contribute to the challenges of correlating satellite-derived PM2.5 estimates with surface measurements?
Causal Antecedent.QuestionCn: 影响卫星衍生的PM2.5估计值与地面测量值相关性的挑战的因素有哪些？
Causal Antecedent.AnswerEn: Traditional physical methods have been used to derive daily PM2.5 concentrations, but these estimates were poorly correlated with surface measurements due to issues such as fine-mode fraction calculations and corrections for humidity and altitude.
Causal Antecedent.AnswerCn: 传统的物理方法用于推导每日PM2.5浓度，但由于细颗粒分数计算、湿度和海拔的修正等问题，这些估计与地面测量的相关性较差。

Causal Antecedent.QuestionEn: Why is the integration of multiple data sources important for generating high-resolution PM2.5 datasets?
Causal Antecedent.QuestionCn: 为什么整合多个数据源对于生成高分辨率的PM2.5数据集很重要？
Causal Antecedent.AnswerEn: The integration of multiple data sources, including satellite observations, meteorological variables, land use, pollutant emissions, and population data, is critical for improving PM2.5-AOD relationships and producing high-resolution PM2.5 datasets.
Causal Antecedent.AnswerCn: 整合多个数据源，包括卫星观测、气象变量、土地利用、污染物排放和人口数据，对于改善PM2.5与气溶胶光学厚度（AOD）之间的关系以及生成高分辨率PM2.5数据集至关重要。

Causal Consequence.QuestionEn: What are the potential outcomes on PM2.5 data accuracy when using artificial intelligence to fill spatial gaps in satellite data?
Causal Consequence.QuestionCn: 使用人工智能填补卫星数据中的空间缺口时，PM2.5数据准确性的潜在结果是什么？
Causal Consequence.AnswerEn: Using artificial intelligence to fill spatial gaps in satellite data can result in higher accuracy PM2.5 datasets, as indicated by the ten-fold cross-validation coefficient of determination R2 of 0.92 and a root mean square error (RMSE) of 10.76 µg/m3 in the ChinaHighPM2.5 dataset.
Causal Consequence.AnswerCn: 使用人工智能填补卫星数据中的空间空白可以提高PM2.5数据集的准确性，正如ChinaHighPM2.5数据集中十折交叉验证的决定系数R²为0.92，均方根误差（RMSE）为10.76 µg/m³所示。

Causal Consequence.QuestionEn: How does the integration of ground measurements and satellite data affect the spatial resolution of PM2.5 datasets over a long-term period?
Causal Consequence.QuestionCn: 地面测量与卫星数据的结合如何影响长期PM2.5数据集的空间分辨率？
Causal Consequence.AnswerEn: Integrating ground measurements with satellite data, such as using the MODIS MAIAC AOD product and other ancillary data, enables the creation of high spatial resolution PM2.5 datasets at a 1 km resolution, allowing for the study of long-term spatiotemporal variations in China, as demonstrated in the ChinaHighPM2.5 dataset.
Causal Consequence.AnswerCn: 将地面测量与卫星数据相结合，例如使用MODIS MAIAC AOD产品和其他辅助数据，可以创建高空间分辨率的PM2.5数据集，分辨率为1公里，从而能够研究中国长期的时空变化，这在ChinaHighPM2.5数据集中得到了验证。

Causal Consequence.QuestionEn: What are the consequences of employing a tree-based ensemble model on the predictive power and accuracy of PM2.5 concentration estimates?
Causal Consequence.QuestionCn: 使用基于树的集成模型对PM2.5浓度估计的预测能力和准确性有什么影响？
Causal Consequence.AnswerEn: Employing a tree-based ensemble model, like the Space-Time Extra-Trees (STET) model, enhances the predictive power and accuracy of PM2.5 concentration estimates, achieving cross-validation R2 values between 0.86 and 0.90, and predictive R2 values between 0.80 and 0.82, outperforming traditional methods.
Causal Consequence.AnswerCn: 采用基于树的集成模型，如空间时间极端树（STET）模型，增强了PM2.5浓度估计的预测能力和准确性，交叉验证R²值在0.86到0.90之间，预测R²值在0.80到0.82之间，优于传统方法。

Goal Orientation.QuestionEn: What is the motivation behind employing the Space-Time Extra-Trees (STET) model for PM2.5 concentration estimation?
Goal Orientation.QuestionCn: 使用时空极端树（STET）模型进行PM2.5浓度估计的动机是什么？
Goal Orientation.AnswerEn: The goal of using the Space-Time Extra-Trees (STET) model is to estimate PM2.5 concentrations at a high spatial resolution of 1 km, leveraging the MODIS MAIAC aerosol product and incorporating various ancillary data like meteorological variables, land use, and pollutant emissions to improve PM2.5-AOD relationships.
Goal Orientation.AnswerCn: 使用时空极端树（STET）模型的目标是利用MODIS MAIAC气溶胶产品和各种辅助数据（如气象变量、土地利用和污染物排放）在1公里的高空间分辨率下估计PM2.5浓度，以改善PM2.5与气溶胶光学深度（AOD）之间的关系。

Goal Orientation.QuestionEn: What are the primary objectives of reconstructing a high-quality PM2.5 dataset for the period 2000 to 2018?
Goal Orientation.QuestionCn: 重建2000年至2018年期间高质量PM2.5数据集的主要目标是什么？
Goal Orientation.AnswerEn: The main objective is to produce for the first time a high-resolution and high-quality PM2.5 dataset that captures well variations in PM2.5 concentrations, allowing for a comprehensive investigation of spatiotemporal PM2.5 variations across China and facilitating the evaluation of government actions combating air pollution.
Goal Orientation.AnswerCn: 主要目标是首次生成一个高分辨率和高质量的PM2.5数据集，能够很好地捕捉PM2.5浓度的变化，从而全面调查中国的时空PM2.5变化，并促进对政府应对空气污染行动的评估。

Instrumental/Procedural.QuestionEn: How does the Space-Time Extra-Trees (STET) model integrate ancillary data to enhance the accuracy of PM2.5 estimations?
Instrumental/Procedural.QuestionCn: 空间时间极端树（STET）模型如何整合辅助数据以提高PM2.5估计的准确性？
Instrumental/Procedural.AnswerEn: The Space-Time Extra-Trees (STET) model incorporates ancillary information such as meteorological variables, land use data, pollutant emissions, and population statistics to strengthen the relationship between PM2.5 and AOD, thus enhancing the accuracy of PM2.5 concentration estimates at a 1 km resolution.
Instrumental/Procedural.AnswerCn: 空间-时间极端随机森林（STET）模型结合了气象变量、土地利用数据、污染物排放和人口统计等辅助信息，以增强PM2.5与气溶胶光学厚度（AOD）之间的关系，从而提高了PM2.5浓度在1公里分辨率下的估计准确性。

Instrumental/Procedural.QuestionEn: What procedural steps are involved in generating a high-resolution PM2.5 dataset from 2000 to 2018 across China?
Instrumental/Procedural.QuestionCn: 在中国生成2000年至2018年高分辨率PM2.5数据集涉及哪些程序步骤？
Instrumental/Procedural.AnswerEn: The process involves using the MODIS MAIAC AOD product and applying the Space-Time Extra-Trees (STET) model, which is a tree-based ensemble approach, to estimate PM2.5 concentrations. The model is supported by additional data on meteorological conditions, land use, emissions, and population, resulting in a high-resolution PM2.5 dataset for China covering the period from 2000 to 2018.
Instrumental/Procedural.AnswerCn: 该过程涉及使用MODIS MAIAC AOD产品，并应用时空极端树（STET）模型，这是一种基于树的集成方法，用于估计PM2.5浓度。该模型得到了气象条件、土地利用、排放和人口等额外数据的支持，从而生成了覆盖2000年至2018年中国的高分辨率PM2.5数据集。

Enablement.QuestionEn: What technological advancements have enabled the integration of satellite remote sensing with ground-based observations to produce high-resolution PM2.5 datasets in China?
Enablement.QuestionCn: 哪些技术进步使得卫星遥感与地面观测的结合能够在中国生成高分辨率的PM2.5数据集？
Enablement.AnswerEn: The use of satellite remote sensing, particularly the MODIS MAIAC AOD product, combined with artificial intelligence techniques and large datasets including ground-based observations, atmospheric reanalysis, and emission inventories, has enabled the generation of high-resolution PM2.5 datasets in China.
Enablement.AnswerCn: 卫星遥感的使用，特别是MODIS MAIAC AOD产品，结合人工智能技术和包括地面观测、大气重分析和排放清单在内的大型数据集，使得在中国生成高分辨率PM2.5数据集成为可能。

Enablement.QuestionEn: How do the inclusion of meteorological variables, land use, and pollutant emissions enhance the accuracy of PM2.5 concentration estimates in data collection methods?
Enablement.QuestionCn: 气象变量、土地利用和污染物排放的纳入如何提高数据收集方法中PM2.5浓度估计的准确性？
Enablement.AnswerEn: The inclusion of meteorological variables, land use, and pollutant emissions improves the PM2.5-AOD relationships, enhancing the model's ability to accurately estimate PM2.5 concentrations for high-resolution datasets.
Enablement.AnswerCn: 气象变量、土地利用和污染物排放的纳入改善了PM2.5与气溶胶光学厚度（AOD）之间的关系，提高了模型对高分辨率数据集准确估计PM2.5浓度的能力。

Enablement.QuestionEn: What challenges are encountered when using traditional physical methods to derive daily PM2.5 concentrations, and how might newer models overcome these challenges?
Enablement.QuestionCn: 使用传统物理方法推导每日PM2.5浓度时会遇到哪些挑战，以及新模型如何克服这些挑战？
Enablement.AnswerEn: Traditional physical methods often result in PM2.5 estimates that poorly correlate with surface measurements, whereas newer models like the Space-Time Extra-Trees (STET) model leverage advanced algorithms and comprehensive datasets to improve accuracy in estimating PM2.5 concentrations.
Enablement.AnswerCn: 传统的物理方法往往导致PM2.5估计值与地面测量结果的相关性较差，而像空间时间极端树（STET）模型这样的新模型利用先进的算法和全面的数据集来提高PM2.5浓度估计的准确性。

Expectation.QuestionEn: Why might traditional physical methods for deriving PM2.5 concentrations not align well with surface measurements?
Expectation.QuestionCn: 传统的物理方法推导PM2.5浓度可能与地面测量结果不太一致的原因是什么？
Expectation.AnswerEn: Traditional physical methods have been used to derive daily PM2.5 concentrations by calculating the fine-mode fraction and correcting for humidity and altitude, but these PM2.5 estimates were poorly correlated with surface measurements.
Expectation.AnswerCn: 传统的物理方法通过计算细颗粒分数并校正湿度和海拔高度来推导每日PM2.5浓度，但这些PM2.5估计值与地面测量值的相关性较差。

Expectation.QuestionEn: Why might spatially continuous PM2.5 data be challenging to generate using satellite remote sensing techniques?
Expectation.QuestionCn: 使用卫星遥感技术生成空间连续的PM2.5数据可能面临哪些挑战？
Expectation.AnswerEn: Satellite remote sensing allows for generating spatially continuous PM2.5 data, but current datasets have overall low accuracies with coarse spatial resolutions limited by data sources and models.
Expectation.AnswerCn: 卫星遥感可以生成空间连续的PM2.5数据，但目前的数据集整体准确性较低，空间分辨率受数据源和模型的限制。

Judgmental.QuestionEn: How would you evaluate the effectiveness of using artificial intelligence techniques to fill spatial gaps in satellite data for creating high-resolution PM2.5 datasets?
Judgmental.QuestionCn: 如何评估使用人工智能技术填补卫星数据中的空间空白，以创建高分辨率PM2.5数据集的有效性？
Judgmental.AnswerEn: Using artificial intelligence techniques to fill spatial gaps in satellite data is considered effective as it has resulted in a high-resolution and high-quality dataset for PM2.5 concentrations across China. The AI-driven approach yields a cross-validation determination coefficient of R2 = 0.92, indicating high accuracy and reliability in the dataset produced.
Judgmental.AnswerCn: 使用人工智能技术填补卫星数据中的空间空白被认为是有效的，因为它为中国的PM2.5浓度提供了高分辨率和高质量的数据集。基于人工智能的方法产生的交叉验证决定系数为R2 = 0.92，表明所生成的数据集具有很高的准确性和可靠性。

Judgmental.QuestionEn: To what extent do you think the spatial resolution of 1 km is sufficient for capturing detailed spatiotemporal variations in PM2.5 concentrations across China?
Judgmental.QuestionCn: 我认为1公里的空间分辨率在多大程度上足以捕捉中国PM2.5浓度的详细时空变化？
Judgmental.AnswerEn: The spatial resolution of 1 km is considered sufficient for capturing detailed spatiotemporal variations in PM2.5 concentrations, as it enables the study of these patterns at different scales. This resolution supports the high accuracy and predictive power required for understanding PM2.5 trends and patterns across diverse regions in China.
Judgmental.AnswerCn: 1公里的空间分辨率被认为足以捕捉PM2.5浓度的详细时空变化，因为它能够在不同尺度上研究这些模式。这种分辨率支持了理解中国各个地区PM2.5趋势和模式所需的高准确性和预测能力。

Assertion.QuestionEn: I can't understand how artificial intelligence techniques can be effectively used to fill spatial gaps in satellite-derived data for air pollution analysis.
Assertion.QuestionCn: 我无法理解如何有效地使用人工智能技术填补卫星获取的空气污染分析数据中的空间空白。
Assertion.AnswerEn: Artificial intelligence techniques are used to fill spatial gaps in satellite-derived data by integrating various data sources such as ground observations, atmospheric reanalysis, and emission inventories. This approach allows for the creation of a seamless dataset by using model data to supplement missing satellite information.
Assertion.AnswerCn: 人工智能技术被用于填补卫星衍生数据中的空间空白，通过整合各种数据源，如地面观测、大气重分析和排放清单。这种方法通过使用模型数据来补充缺失的卫星信息，从而创建一个无缝的数据集。

Assertion.QuestionEn: I'm unsure about the challenges faced in deriving accurate PM2.5 concentration estimates from satellite data.
Assertion.QuestionCn: 我不确定从卫星数据中获取准确的PM2.5浓度估计所面临的挑战。
Assertion.AnswerEn: One of the main challenges in deriving accurate PM2.5 concentration estimates from satellite data is the poor correlation between traditional physical methods and surface measurements. This is due to factors like humidity, altitude, and the fine-mode fraction of aerosols that need to be accounted for, which traditional methods struggle to correct accurately.
Assertion.AnswerCn: 从卫星数据中推导准确的PM2.5浓度估计的主要挑战之一是传统物理方法与地面测量之间的相关性较差。这是由于需要考虑湿度、高度和气溶胶的细颗粒分数等因素，而传统方法在准确校正这些因素方面存在困难。

Request/Directive.QuestionEn: Please analyze the effectiveness of using satellite remote sensing and artificial intelligence techniques to generate high-resolution PM2.5 datasets over large geographical areas.
Request/Directive.QuestionCn: 请分析使用卫星遥感和人工智能技术在大范围地理区域生成高分辨率PM2.5数据集的有效性。
Request/Directive.AnswerEn: Satellite remote sensing and artificial intelligence techniques have been effective in generating high-resolution PM2.5 datasets. By using the MODIS MAIAC AOD product and incorporating artificial intelligence to fill spatial gaps, researchers have produced a seamless near-surface PM2.5 dataset for China with a spatial resolution of 1 km. The dataset's accuracy, with a cross-validation R2 of 0.92 and RMSE of 10.76 µg/m3, suggests that these techniques can accurately capture PM2.5 variations over time and space.
Request/Directive.AnswerCn: 卫星遥感和人工智能技术在生成高分辨率PM2.5数据集方面表现出色。通过使用MODIS MAIAC AOD产品并结合人工智能填补空间缺口，研究人员为中国生成了一个无缝的近地面PM2.5数据集，空间分辨率为1公里。该数据集的准确性显示，交叉验证的R²为0.92，均方根误差（RMSE）为10.76 µg/m³，表明这些技术能够准确捕捉PM2.5在时间和空间上的变化。
